Function to apply variable time delay routing

Source: R/time_delay_routing.R
time_delay_routing.Rd

This function makes a model along with the specification of a point and inputs to the channel. It applies a time delay historgram routing based on the channel length and velocities.

time_delay_routing(model, channel_inflows, point_inflows = NULL,
  diffuse_inflows = NULL, initial_conditions = list())

Arguments

model

a dynamic TOPMODEL list object
channel_inflows

an xts object of flows to the channels
point_inflows

and xts object of point inflows
diffuse_inflows

an xts object of diffuse inflows
initial_conditions

a list of initial conditions

Value

An xts object of flows at the guage locations

Details

Timings are taken from the channel_inflows, other inputs are ignored unless there timings match

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Details
